Hey Ex0 v2,

You're only able to use the Black Spear once. You are able to purchase another in the store, but Kalista can only rebind to another target before the three minute mark.

This should probably be more visible. Maybe point out that you have 3 minutes in the tooltip ingame. Or disable buying it after 3 minutes? I was confused for a long time as to why it was even in the shop, as I'd only ever tried to rebind after 3min and just assumed you couldn't do it.
It's something I'd be happy to ping the Champion team about. :]
Please, it'd be really nice for that to be clarified.
